N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.8 - Safety and sanitation

State Regulations
(a) All
buildings, premises, equipment and furnishings used for the prekindergarten
program shall be safe and suitable for the comfort and care of the children and
shall be provided and maintained in a good state of repair and sanitation, as
determined by the commissioner. (b) Suitable precautions shall be taken to eliminate all conditions which may
contribute to or create a fire. (c) Fire drills shall be held in accordance with the provisions of section
807
of the

Education Law. A record of these drills shall be maintained. Notes
